metadata.title: Sea Island Imports Giraffe Design Hand Carved Acacia Hardwood Decorative Short Stool
description: Oh how handsome this guy is. We are very proud of the chair and the painter who got this one exactly right. He joins other animals from Africa, the elephant, the lion and the tiger. Perfect for the kid's room or a safari-themed office or den. Sturdy and practical at 10" tall and about 11" square.
